title: [Isle of Ornath, Fountain]
description: Separating the promenade from the courtyard is a low white stucco wall, which is bisected by a series of stone steps that is flanked by ropey bougainvillea vines housed in enormous terracotta planters.  Concentric bands of ebon, white, green, red, and blue travertine pavers surround a burbling fountain under the watchful eye of illuminated frosted globes.  Rising in a spiral from within the fountain's water is a copper sculpture depicting a pandemonium of parrots.
paths: Obvious paths: northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest
